committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title V of the Housing Act of 1949 to provide for the use of fee appraisers and construction inspectors.

summary.text: Provides for the use of fee aprpasers and construction inspectors, as required by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development under the Housing Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to amend title V of the Housing Act of 1949 to provide for the use of fee appraisers and construction inspectors.
